comm_cricbuzz: 19.6    S Kaul to de Grandhomme, out Caught by Rashid Khan!! Sunrisers Hyderabad make it five in five at home this season. A wicket to end the match, quite fittingly. Dropped slow on a length, Colin de Grandhomme wanted a picture-perfect finish but finds a teenager at long-off. All done.
